channel.title: CVE Feed for DMG MORI Digital Co., LTD. and NEXT Co., Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DMG MORI Digital Co., LTD. and NEXT Co., Ltd. -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-28957|2024-04-15T10:48:59.978Z -- DMG MORI Digital Co., LTD. and NEXT Co., Ltd. -- Cente TCP/IPv4
item.description: Generation of predictable identifiers issue exists in Cente middleware TCP/IP Network Series. If this vulnerability is exploited, a remote unauthenticated attacker may interfere communications by predicting some packet header IDs of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-28894|2024-04-15T10:47:50.522Z -- DMG MORI Digital Co., LTD. and NEXT Co., Ltd. -- Cente IPv6
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability caused by improper checking of the option length values in IPv6 headers exists in Cente middleware TCP/IP Network Series, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker to stop the device operations by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.title: CVE-2024-23911|2024-04-15T10:46:29.583Z -- DMG MORI Digital Co., LTD. and NEXT Co., Ltd. -- Cente IPv6
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability caused by improper checking of the option length values in IPv6 NDP packets exists in Cente middleware TCP/IP Network Series, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker to stop the device operations by sending a specially crafted packet.
